src.Components.Dashboard.Dashboard.Expor: If you've logged in with a mnemonic, please note that using a private key to login would result in the wallet using the address for the chain that you've currently selected i.e a VET address if you've selected the V3 contract and an ETH address if you've selected the V1/V2 contract.

src.Components.Wallet.ConfirmedTransacti: 未来的令牌传递将被列在此处
src.Components.Wallet.Dialogs.LearnMoreD:
草签合同中的所有令牌将以 1:1 的比例获得升级。 如果您在草签合同中有 100 DBET，那么它们将被升级到当前合同并从草签合同中删除。 新的令牌合同也将用于未来所有的平台功能，所以请
                    确保令牌尽快获得升级。
删除众售功能使得令牌合同的使用更加精简和容易。
针对错误情况从投掷切换到返回——这表示错误的交易将不再消耗汽油，节省交易费用。
Decent.bet 令牌合同已升级到当前版本 - v2 - 针对令牌合同发布最终的总供给量，还有一些有利于未来使用的改进。
用户可以不用再传递令牌到令牌合同——否则将导致令牌的永远丢失。
src.Components.Wallet.WalletHeader.ViewA: 在 Etherscan 上查看帐户
src.Components.Wallet.Dialogs.VETLearnMo: Since DBET's migrating from the Ethereum blockchain to Vechain Thor, we recommend token holders upgrade ERC-20 V1/V2 DBETs they own on the Ethereum blockchain.
The Decent.bet platform will be making use of the VIP-180 (VET's equivalent of ERC-20) DBET token for all reasons within the platform here onward.
Also, exchanges currently listing the ERC-20 V1/V2 DBET tokens will also be migrating to support the VIP-180 version instead.

This process will be run indefinitely for the time being. There however may be a chance that we limit automated migrations and require users to pay for manual migrations later in the future – which would mainly be to encourage quicker migrations and minimize security risks.
